rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Art Deco motifs and a statement chandelier.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An open space with floor-to-ceiling windows, large Art Deco mirrors, and elegant geometric patterns. Vastu principles are considered for energy flow, placing the entrance to the east.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with a breakfast nook; designed in Art Deco style with streamlined furniture and decor.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable master suite with en-suite bathroom; positioned as per Vastu guidelines for restful energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional bedroom for family members, ensuring privacy and a harmonious layout.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Another guest bedroom incorporating Art Deco finishes and ample natural light from floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Attached to the master suite; designed with modern fixtures while respecting Vastu guidelines for water placements.
